https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k1IeVdhsM3vnXjEfZr0kdilnttY.jpg A giant monster sends a town's citizens into a panic, except for a girl named Yuki and her schoolmate Tetsu. Tetsu happens to have his own strange creature named Cenco as a pet. Another boy named Shuu controls the monster threatening the town, and the stage is set for a battle. Cencoroll
